definition: video gaming (as a sport)/e-sports (abbr. to 電競|电竞[dian4 jing4])
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A big part of "eSports" is the concept of balanced play, level playing field.
sentences.chinese: 電子競技的一個重要內容是平衡及等級分野。

sentences.english: NVIDIA World Cup for E-sports contest , the grand FITA round will be adopted.
sentences.chinese: NVIDIA世界盃電子競技大賽，選拔賽是淘汰制。

sentences.english: The team have recently competed in the World E-Sports Games league in South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 該隊最近參加了於韓國舉行的世界電子競技聯賽。
